  • FEATURES

Powerful Features

Streamline your entire recruitment process—from job posting to offer—on one intelligent platform.

Job Management

Create, manage, and track job postings across multiple channels.

Candidate Management

Comprehensive candidate profiles and tracking throughout the hiring process.

Interview Management

Schedule, conduct, and evaluate interviews with integrated tools.

Account Management

Manage client accounts and maintain strong business relationships.

Contact Management

Centralized contact database with communication history.

Opportunity Management

Track and manage business opportunities from lead to closure.

Leads Management

Capture, qualify, and nurture leads through the sales funnel.

Employee Management

Complete employee lifecycle management and HR operations.

Campaign Management

Design and execute targeted recruitment and marketing campaigns.

Performance Management

Track and evaluate employee performance with comprehensive analytics.

US Compliance I-9

Automated I-9 form management and compliance tracking.

Time & Attendance

Time tracking and expense management for contractors and employees.

Resume Harvesting

Automated resume collection from multiple job boards and sources.

Job Grabber

Automatically extract and import job postings from various platforms.

Bench Management

Manage available consultants and optimize bench utilization.

Document Management

Centralized document storage with version control and security.

Invoice Generation

Automated invoice creation and billing management system.

Enterprise Career Portal

Branded career portal for enterprise-level talent acquisition.

Expense

Expense tracking with approvals, policy checks, and reporting.

Employee Onboarding

Automated onboarding with forms, checklists, and provisioning.
